MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY1 postcode area of Kirkcaldy, affecting properties in Randolph Place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 08:21am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:40am on the 16th of February 2021.
